titleStmt.title: How to be certainly saved. Instructions for a holy life [I.] The necessity, reason and means of holiness. [II.] The parts and practice of a holy life. For personal direction, and for family instruction. With two short catechisms, and prayers. Written by Rich. Baxter.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
